verses.kjv: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;
verses.web: Be therefore imitators of God, as beloved children.
verses.ct: So follow God's example, the way beloved children imitate their father.

verses.kjv: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.
verses.web: Walk in love, even as Christ also loved us and gave himself up for us, an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling fragrance.
verses.ct: Let love guide everything you do, just as Christ loved us and gave himself up for us as an offering and sacrifice to God — a sweet-smelling fragrance.

verses.kjv: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;
verses.web: But sexual immorality, and all uncleanness or covetousness, let it not even be mentioned among you, as becomes saints;
verses.ct: There must not be even a hint of sexual immorality, impurity, or greed among you. That's what it means to be set apart as God's people.

verses.kjv: Neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.
verses.web: nor filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not appropriate, but rather giving of thanks.
verses.ct: Stay away from obscene talk, foolish chatter, and crude jokes — none of that is fitting. Instead, let your words be filled with thankfulness.

verses.kjv: For this ye know, that no whoremonger, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.
verses.web: Know this for sure, that no sexually immoral person, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, has any inheritance in the Kingdom of Christ and God.
verses.ct: You can be sure of this: no sexually immoral person, no one who is impure, and no greedy person — which is the same as being an idolater — has any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.

verses.kjv: Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience.
verses.web: Let no one deceive you with empty words. For because of these things, the wrath of God comes on the children of disobedience.
verses.ct: Don't let anyone fool you with empty arguments. These are the very things that bring God's wrath down on those who refuse to obey him.

verses.kjv: Be not ye therefore partakers with them.
verses.web: Therefore don’t be partakers with them.
verses.ct: So don't participate in what they do.

verses.kjv: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:
verses.web: For you were once darkness, but are now light in the Lord. Walk as children of light,
verses.ct: You used to be nothing but darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. So live as people of light.

verses.kjv: (For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth;)
verses.web: for the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth,
verses.ct: The fruit of the Spirit produces every kind of goodness, righteousness, and truth.

verses.kjv: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.
verses.web: proving what is well pleasing to the Lord.
verses.ct: Figure out what pleases the Lord, and do that.

verses.kjv: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them.
verses.web: Have no fellowship with the unfruitful deeds of darkness, but rather even reprove them.
verses.ct: Don't get involved in the worthless activities that belong to darkness. Instead, expose them for what they are.

verses.kjv: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.
verses.web: For it is a shame even to speak of the things which are done by them in secret.
verses.ct: The things people do in secret are so shameful it's disgraceful even to talk about them.

verses.kjv: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.
verses.web: But all things, when they are reproved, are revealed by the light, for everything that reveals is light.
verses.ct: But when anything is exposed by the light, it becomes visible for what it really is — because light reveals everything.

verses.kjv: Wherefore he saith, Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.
verses.web: Therefore he says, “Awake, you who sleep, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you.”
verses.ct: That's why it says: "Wake up, you who are sleeping! Rise from the dead, and Christ will shine his light on you."

verses.kjv: See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,
verses.web: Therefore watch carefully how you walk, not as unwise, but as wise,
verses.ct: So be very careful how you live. Don't act like fools — live wisely.

verses.kjv: Redeeming the time, because the days are evil.
verses.web: redeeming the time, because the days are evil.
verses.ct: Make the most of every opportunity, because the times we live in are evil.

verses.kjv: Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord is.
verses.web: Therefore don’t be foolish, but understand what the will of the Lord is.
verses.ct: Don't be foolish. Instead, seek to understand what the Lord wants from you.

verses.kjv: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;
verses.web: Don’t be drunken with wine, in which is dissipation, but be filled with the Spirit,
verses.ct: Don't get drunk on wine — that only leads to reckless living. Instead, be filled with the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;
verses.web: speaking to one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs; singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;
verses.ct: Encourage each other with psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs. Sing and make music in your heart to the Lord.

verses.kjv: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;
verses.web: giving thanks always concerning all things in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, to God, even the Father;
verses.ct: Always give thanks to God the Father for everything, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.
verses.web: subjecting yourselves to one another in the fear of Christ.
verses.ct: Submit to one another out of the fear of God.

verses.kjv: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.
verses.web: Wives, be subject to your own husbands, as to the Lord.
verses.ct: Wives, submit to your own husbands as you do to the Lord.

verses.kjv: For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.
verses.web: For the husband is the head of the wife, as Christ also is the head of the assembly, being himself the savior of the body.
verses.ct: The husband is the head of the wife, just as Christ is the head of the church — and Christ himself is the savior of the body.

verses.kjv: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing.
verses.web: But as the assembly is subject to Christ, so let the wives also be to their own husbands in everything.
verses.ct: Just as the church submits to Christ, wives should submit to their husbands in everything.

verses.kjv: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
verses.web: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the assembly, and gave himself up for it;
verses.ct: Husbands, love your wives the same way Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her.

verses.kjv: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,
verses.web: that he might sanctify it, having cleansed it by the washing of water with the word,
verses.ct: He did this to set her apart as holy, cleansing her through the washing of water by his word,

verses.kjv: That he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.
verses.web: that he might present the assembly to himself gloriously, not having spot or wrinkle or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without defect.
verses.ct: so that he could present the church to himself in all her glory — without stain or wrinkle or any flaw — completely holy and without blemish.

verses.kjv: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.
verses.web: Even so husbands also ought to love their own wives as their own bodies. He who loves his own wife loves himself.
verses.ct: In the same way, husbands should love their wives as they love their own bodies. A man who loves his wife is really loving himself.

verses.kjv: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:
verses.web: For no man ever hated his own flesh; but nourishes and cherishes it, even as the Lord also does the assembly;
verses.ct: After all, no one has ever hated his own body. Instead, he feeds it and takes care of it — just as the Lord does for the church.

verses.kjv: For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.
verses.web: because we are members of his body, of his flesh and bones.
verses.ct: We are part of his body, of his flesh and of his bones.

verses.kjv: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.
verses.web: “For this cause a man will leave his father and mother, and will be joined to his wife. The two will become one flesh.”
verses.ct: "For this reason, a man will leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife, and the two will become one flesh."

verses.kjv: This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.
verses.web: This mystery is great, but I speak concerning Christ and of the assembly.
verses.ct: This is a great mystery — but I'm talking about Christ and the church.

verses.kjv: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.
verses.web: Nevertheless each of you must also love his own wife even as himself; and let the wife see that she respects her husband.
verses.ct: Still, the point stands: each husband must love his wife as he loves himself, and each wife must respect her husband.
